metadata.description: A marketplace for Claude Code plugins

plugins.name: centauro
plugins.description: Context Engineering framework for professional management of context files using the C = A(c₁, c₂, c₃, c₄, c₅, c₆) methodology

plugins.name: ouroboros
plugins.description: Meta-recursive toolkit for building Claude Code extensions (Skills, Commands, Subagents, Hooks) with validation, quality grading, and security review capabilities

plugins.name: hefesto
plugins.description: Software development lifecycle management plugin that structures feature development from conception through completion, separating Product Owner and Developer responsibilities with distinct po: and dev: namespaces
